title: Judge Hodgman: Tear Down That Wall
description: Foy argues that breaking the fourth wall ruins film and theater.  His friend Matt disagrees.  Only Judge John Hodgman can decide.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
content:encoded: Foy argues that breaking the fourth wall ruins film and theater.  His friend Matt disagrees.  Only Judge John Hodgman can decide.
